title: Thursday Post Show (10-21-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (10-21-21)
description:
Bobby starts talking about the BobbyCast coming out tomorrow with songwriter Jerry Flowers and bass player / musical director for Keith Urban. Scuba Steve tells us about how he keeps getting calls from North Korea. Amy also shares that her 4-year adoption report is coming up. Amy is also determined to get her college ring back. We also play a round of Blank Slate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
